content:
I just registered for Midcamp 2021. If you liked the format for Backdrop LIVE, you may really like this Drupal Camp. They are embracing the virtual unconference model and have some interesting things planned.

I see that @jenlampton has proposed a Backdrop session. I've proposed a few generic topics about managing a small web shop and working with designers. Midcamp has been VERY friendly to Backdrop in the past and I love the folks who are involved. I've love to see more folks from the Backdrop Community propose topics and get involved in this camp.

https://www.midcamp.org/

MidCamp 2021 | March 24 - 27, 2021
Midwest Drupal Camp (MidCamp) is an annual event held in Chicago (virtual in 2020 & 2021) that brings together people who use, develop, design, and support the Web’s leading content management platform, Drupal.
I really like the format of their registration page!
It would be great to see the the BUS module polished and get more attention garnered to it during this camp.
@jenlampton - Do you think you will be able to participate in Midcamp tomorrow? Your session idea is still on the list of possible topics.
They make the schedule for tomorrow, tomorrow.

If anyone liked the format for Backdrop LIVE, you might be interested in: https://www.midcamp.org/

Here is a link to possible topics for tomorrows event: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vT_OTHXtn_7KlDESa7muoXRS2zsqL8xPiWyoOEkzc6u0ot13KIbDjRW_Bag5BknCffI1C6tHeFxq4KE/pubhtml?gid=280849226&single=true

MidCamp 2021 | March 24 - 27, 2021
Midwest Drupal Camp (MidCamp) is an annual event held in Chicago (virtual in 2020 & 2021) that brings together people who use, develop, design, and support the Web’s leading content management platform, Drupal.

StPaulTim said:

jenlampton - Do you think you will be able to participate in Midcamp tomorrow? Your session idea is still on the list of possible topics.

I will be available from 1pm PT (3pm CT) onward. Timzones seems to be a continuning issue :(
